column5: Hey all,   first post, but have been on reading posts for a while. looks like a great site.  been fishing all my life recreationally, but with no real success stories to date =\  I have a little family place outside of Espanola that has been the source of my pleasure my whole life. We fish for Pike, Walleye, lake t's, and pans. (although Ive never caught a lake trout) http://flickr.com/photos/youngvedder/1366616364/ other pics are on there from the camp.  fishing is pretty good, but the peace and quiet is even better. anyone fish this area?  cheers,  Yv

Glad to have you on board and don't hesitate to share some of your pleasure.  We like pics of all species no matter how big.  Heck - just look at my first report for the year ... nothing bigger than the palm of my hand.  Hope to fix that in just under 3 weeks.
welcome aboard looks like a great place to have a cottage
Welcome aboard.  I like my peace with the splash of a spinnerbait.
Welcome to the board!  Great pic...a little slice of heaven I'd say.
welcome to the board, pull up a chair and let us know about your fishing fun.
Welcome aboard I have fished agnew lake and angness river there are some great places along there. I also fished Michales bay and south baymouth great place to live you should like it here.
Welcome aboard. It's a great place here, i'm sure you'll enjoy it.
Welcome to our OFC family youngvedder. (Pearl Jam fan ???) Looks like a great spot, but I've never fished it myself. Hopefully, one day I'll get around to that part of Ontario's paradise.
Welcome aboard!  Your photo gallery is awesome, is there any place you haven't been?
